changeSet.sql: UPDATE nomenclator_attribute SET type_nomenclator_selection_filters_custom_class='ro.cloudSoft.cloudDoc.services.nomenclator.customSelectionFilters.ReprezentantMembruAfiliatOfInstitutii', type_nomenclator_selection_filters_custom_class_attribute_keys='attribute1' WHERE nomenclator_id=(select id from nomenclator where code='institutii') and key='attribute22';
